topic3.Service

Interface ServiceCart

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceCartImplementation, ServiceCartProxy

    public interface ServiceCart

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToCart(int key, Product product)
      Adds a Product to the Map identified by a key number
      java.math.BigDecimal calculateTotal()
      Calculates the total Products amount contained into the Cart Map
      Cart emptyCart()
      Removes all Product objects form the Map
      Cart getCart()
      Returns the Cart object
      Product readProduct(int key)
      Gets a Product object contained in the Map identified by a key number sent by parameters
      Product removeProduct(int key)
      Removes a Product object contained in the Map indexed by an key parameter

    • Method Detail

      • addToCart

        void addToCart(int key,
               Product product)
        Adds a Product to the Map identified by a key number
        Parameters:
        key - Number used as a key to index a Product into the Map
        product - Product to add to the Map indexed with the specific key

      • readProduct

        Product readProduct(int key)
        Gets a Product object contained in the Map identified by a key number sent by parameters
        Parameters:
        key - Number used as a key where the Product is indexed in the Map
        Returns:
        a Product object identified with the specific key

      • removeProduct

        Product removeProduct(int key)
        Removes a Product object contained in the Map indexed by an key parameter
        Parameters:
        key - int number that represents the key where the Product to remove is contained
        Returns:
        Product object deleted from the Map

      • emptyCart

        Cart emptyCart()
        Removes all Product objects form the Map
        Returns:
        Cart object empty

      • calculateTotal

        java.math.BigDecimal calculateTotal()
        Calculates the total Products amount contained into the Cart Map
        Returns:
        BigDecimal object representing the final amount

      • getCart

        Cart getCart()
        Returns the Cart object
        Returns:
        Cart object
